title: Laportes
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The menu offers vegan options, including breakfasts, salads & sandwiches. The daily specials board clearly labels vegan (or vegan option available) & gluten free dishes. The staff are happy to replace things like feta in a meal with vegan-friendly alternatives. There is also a small shop attached selling organic and local produce, including vegetarian & vegan items.
